title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Updated project requirements documentation for RealTimeAdOptimizer. The document will clearly define the desired features, performance metrics, integration points with existing systems, data sources, security/privacy considerations, potential edge cases, examples of best practices for real-time advertising optimization engines, and provide specific use cases to illustrate these concepts. Additionally, this updated version will specify any required non-functional requirements (such as scalability, reliability, fault tolerance, and real-time processing capabilities), highlighting the expected impact on user engagement and conversion rates. The document will emphasize the need for extensive testing, monitoring, and continuous improvement processes to ensure optimal performance. Furthermore, it will provide a detailed plan for the development, deployment, and maintenance of the system, including milestones, timelines, and resources required. This RFC is ready for review by the Project Manager and Code-Architect. Please note that while the document is ready for review, further input and suggestions from Code-Architect are welcome.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flows, and communication protocols.

title: Implement Data Ingestion and Processing
description: Develop the components responsible for ingesting user engagement and conversion data from various sources and processing it for further analysis.

title: Develop Ad Optimization Algorithms
description: Implement the algorithms and machine learning models responsible for optimizing ad placements, content, and bidding strategies based on the processed data.

title: Build User Interface and Reporting
description: Develop the user interface and reporting components for monitoring system performance, configuring optimization parameters, and visualizing optimization results.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate access controls, data encryption, and other security measures.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application to various environments.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and performs as expected.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive technical documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Deploy the system to production environments, monitor its performance, and implement processes for ongoing maintenance and support.
dependencies: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
